text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the ASUS GU502GU-XB74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS GU502GU-XB74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Valorant. The build quality of the ASUS GU502GU-XB74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS GU502GU-XB74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
